#summary BigBlueButton LTI implementation.


= Overview =

The bbb-lti service is a component that enables a BigBluebutton server to serve as a Learning Tools Interoperability (LTI) Tool in any Learning Management System (LMS) supporting the LTI standard. [http://developers.imsglobal.org/]
Example LTI compliant LMSs are Moodle, Sakai, Canvas and Blackboard [http://www.imsglobal.org/cc/statuschart.cfm IMS Interoperability Conformance Certification Status].
